name: Power Play Sports Trivia
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Think You Got Game?

Time to put up or shut up with Power Play Sports Trivia!

  • Climb the ranking leader, reach the Hall of Fame, and become a Trivia Legend

  • Take on 4,000 brain-bruising questions from the wide, wide world of football, basketball, baseball, and hockey.

  • 2 Tenacious Trivia Modes:
    TOURNAMENT: Up to 4 players face off to decide who's got the fastest fingers and the maddest skills.
    LAST MAN STANDING: Avoid the 5 wrong answers and go for the longest winning streak in history.
